name: Leaflet Armor
description: Full Set Bonus: Energy of the Forest Regenerates your Statistic Health by 5 every second while in a forest.

name: Forest Biome Stick
description: You can change the biome of your island as Forest with this strange stick.

name: Wood Affinity Talisman
description: Grants +10 Statistic Speed while in Graveyard or Forest.

name: Taiga Biome Stick
description: You can change the biome of your island as Taiga with this strange stick.

name: Wolf Pet
description: Stats: +0.5 Statistic Health per level +0.2 Statistic Speed per level +0.1 Statistic True Defense per level +0.1% Statistic Critical Chance per level Abilities: Alpha Dog: +0.3% less damage per level Pack Leader: +0.15% Statistic Critical Damage per level Combat Wisdom Boost: +0.3 Statistic Combat Wisdom per level

name: Birch Forest Biome Stick
description: You can change the biome of your island as Birch Forest with this strange stick.
